{{cpp/named req/title|NumericType}}
{{cpp/named req/navbar}}
Specifies that the type can be used as the template argument of {{lc|std::valarray}}.

=== Requirements ===
For a type {{ttb|T}} to be a {{named req/core|NumericType}}, it must be a cv-unqualified object type that:&lt;!--LWG 3133--&gt;
* Meets the {{named req|DefaultConstructible}}, {{named req|CopyConstructible}}, {{named req|CopyAssignable}} and {{named req|Destructible}} requirements.
* No operation on {{tt|T}} may throw exceptions.
